sentences.en: All the critical twiddle - twaddle about style and form is mere impertinence and mostly dull jargon.
sentences.cn: 所有这些有关文体和体裁的蠢话,只是风马牛不相及的胡扯,多半是枯燥无味、玩弄述语的评论.

sentences.en: Don't try to palm off that twaddle about the Cause to me.
sentences.cn: 请不要拿出什么主义之类的废话来跟我胡聊了.

sentences.en: I don’t believe in all that twaddle about fate.
sentences.cn: 我不相信那些关于命运的鬼话。

sentences.en: I've never heard such utter twaddle!
sentences.cn: 我还从来没听过这么愚蠢透顶的话!

sentences.en: Much of this is total twaddle, especially for football and banking.
sentences.cn: 这些说法大多数完全是瞎扯, 尤其是对于足球和银行业而言.

sentences.en: Third, and most powerfully, it is total twaddle.
sentences.cn: 第三, 也是最具说服力的原因, 这完全是胡扯.

sentences.en: What twaddle all these paradises are!

trans.tran_en: something that someone has said or written that you think is stupid
